instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no keyboard or trackpad
threads.message:
had a job come in 2 months ago for no kb and tpad, open it up the kb bkl connector is corroded, replace it run jumper to the other side.
works perfectly, give it back charge $400
2 days later comes back no kb and tpad, repeal kb bkl connector completely and remove jumper
works perfectly
2 days later comes back no kb and tpad, sits in queue for 6 weeks waiting for something to be done about it

from off, option key brings up boot menu, tpad not working, kb not responsive 
works with usb keyboard and mouse

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no keyboard or trackpad
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no keyboard or trackpad
threads.message: new cable ordered, installed and works thanks a lot :)
